attributes.name: name
attributes.description: Name of the partition e.g. C:

attributes.name: label
attributes.description: Label or VolumeName of the partition

attributes.name: fileSystem
attributes.description: FileSystem of the partition e.g. NTFS

attributes.name: description
attributes.description: A textual description of the partition

attributes.name: sizeBytes
attributes.description: Size of the partition in bytes

attributes.name: vendor
attributes.description: Vendor of the optical or floppy drive

attributes.name: version
attributes.description: Version of the optical or floppy drive
